list.name: Default
list.comment: Tweaked site to allow for multiple themes and put themes into appropriate folders. Updated lessphp and added bootstrap twitter less version.

setup english content and german content
styled the request a call button for support
Add servicenow press release and flyer
created german version of servicenow flyer download
set download section to language true and translated the download sidebar
Changed home logo link to link to main homepage
